question: On the balance sheet of a company, the value of the asset bought through hire purchase will appear as which of the following?
option1: Cost less depreciation to date less amount owing on hire purchase less interest owing
option2: Cost less amounts owing on hire purchase
option4: Cost less depreciation to date less amount owing on hire purchase
explanation: On the balance sheet of a company, the value of the asset bought through hire purchase will appear as cost less depreciation to date.
